Great thoughts, <@486501030046203915>  <:eth2:595693639913570305> 
IMO, Validators tending towards rationality in the long-run is already proven in practice, we see it clearly in the staking scene. Roles Separation is something we need to take very serious into consideration in order to ensure the protection of the protocol  by better controlling the Validators that execute the protocol. Exploring the enshrinement of roles separation is part of the Scourge roadmap anyways, although I think this might just be one of the hardest part in the development of the protocol because it involves amendments to the incentive layer and market allocation... and it requires the community to come together to a common view
